alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hardeman, McNairy and southwestern Chester Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bolivar, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Selmer, Adamsville, Masseyville, Robertson, Bethel Springs, Eastview, Michie, Ramer, Hornsby, Stantonville, Forty Forks, Rose Creek, Good Hope, Pine Top, Pebble Hill, Old Lawton, Hebron, Purdy and Hickory Flats. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
